settings.heading: The Ultimate Indoor Golf Experience
settings.subheading: Bring the world's most iconic courses to your home with our state-of-the-art simulator packages. Unmatched realism, precision, and quality.

settings.title: Complete Simulator Packages
settings.description: All-in-one solutions for the ultimate indoor golf experience. Hand-picked for performance and quality.

settings.title: AI-Powered Buying Guide
settings.description: Not sure where to start? Answer a few questions about your space and budget, and our AI expert will recommend the perfect simulator package for you.

settings.heading: It Completely Transformed My Game
settings.quote: "I was hesitant about the investment, but my Pro Tour Package from SimGolf has been a game-changer. The accuracy is unbelievable, and being able to play a full round at Pebble Beach after work is a dream come true. My handicap has dropped 5 strokes in three months."
settings.author: - Dr. Michael Chen, Avid Golfer

settings.title: Essential Accessories
settings.description: Elevate your setup with our premium range of launch monitors, hitting mats, and enclosures.
